artist: Artist: Merry Death , et al.; Author: Ariel Clemenzi , et al.; Publisher: Ariel Clemenzi , Chicago
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Stab stitched binding, xerographc text and illustration of two women, colored by hand in wax crayon, on wove paper covers; 54 pp.
title: Women's Self-Defense: Stories & Strategies of Survival
